div.p: ROSTOFF or Rosτow, a large town of the Ruffian empire, and capital of a territory of the ſame name, w , ith an archbiſhop’s ſee, ſeated on the lake Coteri, in E. Long. 40. 25. N. Lat. 57. I he duchy of Roſ-toff is bounded on the north by Jaroſlow, on the eaſt by Sutdal, on the ſouth by the duchy of Moi’cow, and on the weft by that of Tuere.
